analyzed: / bod skad du/_bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/
translated: In the Tibetan language: Homage to the Blessed Glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par
analyzed: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par
translated: Then again, the Blessed One, having gathered all the tathāgatas,

analyzed: 'dus nas/_bcom ldan 'das bde mchog 'khor lo la bstod pa/_rgyal ba'i
translated: praised the Blessed Heruka Cakrasaṃvara:

analyzed: sprul pa dus mtha'i me ltar rab du 'jigs sprid cing /_/ram ram rnam sprul ud
translated: The emanation of the Victorious One, blazing like the fire at the end of time,

analyzed: pal sngo 'dra nyi ma brgya yi gzi/_/rdo rje dang ni kha dong kha bcas om om dag par
translated: with the emanation of Ram Ram, blue like a blue lotus, the splendor of a hundred suns,🔽endowed with the purity of Vajra and Khaḍga,

original: ldan/_/tshhangs dang lha chen khyab 'jug mgo bcad dbu'i cod pan mdzad
analyzed: ldan/_/tshhangs dang lha chen khyab 'jug mgo bcad dbu'i cod pan mdzad
translated: with the severed heads of Brahmā, Mahādeva, and Viṣṇu as his head ornaments,🔽with the garland of intestines and blue heads, Hu Lu Hu Lu, Ji Ji, Tram Tram,

original: pa'o/_/hu lu hu lu dzi dzi tram tram rgyu ma thod sngon gyis/_/phreng ba mdzad cing rdo
analyzed: pa'o/_/hu lu hu lu dzi dzi tram tram rgyu ma thod sngon gyis/_/phreng ba mdzad cing rdo
translated: with the garland of intestines and blue heads, Hu Lu Hu Lu, Ji Ji, Tram Tram,

original: rje mkha' 'gro sha za khro mo'i/_/sku sgra mi bzad ru ru lu lus rab tu rmongs mdzad
analyzed: rje mkha' 'gro sha za khro mo'i/_/sku sgra mi bzad ru ru lu lus rab tu rmongs mdzad
translated: The dakini, the terrifying flesh-eating one,🔽is completely confused by the sound of the great vajra.

original: de/_/rdo rje chen po ma ma kis ni sku lus rnam par rgyan/_/dur khrod 'jigs🔽pa'i gar gyis 'byung po'i tshhogs ni sreg mdzad pa/_/ka he ka he bzhad sgras hre
analyzed: de/_/rdo rje chen po ma ma kis ni sku lus rnam par rgyan/_/dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gar gyis 'byung po'i tshhogs ni sreg mdzad pa/_/ka he ka he bzhad sgras hre
translated: She is adorned with a body that is the great mother.🔽With the dance of the terrifying charnel ground, she burns the hosts of bhutas.🔽With the sound of “kahe kahe,” she terrifies and paralyzes the great yakshas.

original: hri   hri gnod sbyin chen po skrag rengs mdzad/_/g.yas brkyang tshhul gyis bzhugs shing
analyzed: hri   hri gnod sbyin chen po skrag rengs mdzad/_/g.yas brkyang tshhul gyis bzhugs shing
translated: She stands with the right leg straight and the left bent,

original: b+hi b+hi sha nas sku lus rnam par brgyan/_/bskal pa grangs med rgyun mi 'chad pa'i
analyzed: b+hi b+hi sha nas sku lus rnam par brgyan/_/bskal pa grangs med rgyun mi 'chad pa'i
translated: adorned with a body that is the great mother.🔽At the end of time, for countless eons,

original: dus kyi mthar yang ni/_/ha na ha na da ha da ha phat kyi mdzad pa can/_/stong
analyzed: dus kyi mthar yang ni/_/ha na ha na da ha da ha phat kyi mdzad pa can/_/stong
translated: she has the activity of “hana hana dhaha dhaha phata.”

original: pa'i ngang las sku gsung thugs kyis sangs rgyas rnam par spro/_/phyin ci log zhen lta
analyzed: pa'i ngang las sku gsung thugs kyis sangs rgyas rnam par spro/_/phyin ci log zhen lta
translated: From the state of emptiness, she emanates the body, speech, and mind of the buddhas.🔽She removes all the extremes of bad views and clinging to perversions.

original: ngan mtha' dag ma lus sel mdzad cing /_/lu gu lu gu dzi dzi yi yam dag gis zhi
analyzed: ngan mtha' dag ma lus sel mdzad cing /_/lu gu lu gu dzi dzi yi yam dag gis zhi
translated: With “lugulu gugu jiji yam,” she pacifies🔽and removes all the afflictions of the three realms.

original: bar mdzad/_/nam mkha' mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin du thugs ni rnam par smin/_/
analyzed: bar mdzad/_/nam mkha' mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin du thugs ni rnam par smin/_/
translated: Your mind is fully ripened in the samadhi equal to space.

original: bde ba chen po'i mgon po khyod ni mo mam mdzad pa can/_/sems can don du🔽thugs rje chen po dgyes sha mdzad pa po/_/a li ka li rnal 'byor sdom pa rab tu
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i mgon po khyod ni mo mam mdzad pa can/_/sems can don du thugs rje chen po dgyes sha mdzad pa po/_/a li ka li rnal 'byor sdom pa rab tu
translated: You, the protector of great bliss, are the one who does not engage in sexual union,🔽but for the sake of sentient beings,🔽you are the one who delights in great compassion.🔽You are the one who fully teaches the yoga of the union of vowels and consonants,

original: gsungs pa can/_/bcom ldan mkha' 'gro dam tshhig ma lus bstan mdzad pa'i/_/
analyzed: gsungs pa can/_/bcom ldan mkha' 'gro dam tshhig ma lus bstan mdzad pa'i/_/
translated: and you, the Bhagavan, reveal all the dakinis' sacred pledges.

original: dpal chen he ru bstan g.yo'i bdag po de la phyag 'tshhal lo//_///
analyzed: dpal chen he ru bstan g.yo'i bdag po de la phyag 'tshhal lo//_///
translated: I pay homage to you, the great hero Heruka, the lord of the teachings.

original: a a zhes pa'i gsung chen gyis/_/gang rgyangs chen pos snod dbang bskur/
analyzed: a a zhes pa'i gsung chen gyis/_/gang rgyangs chen pos snod dbang bskur/
translated: With the great sound of a a, you empower the vessel with great reverberation.

original: rgyu 'thun 'bras bu smin mdzad pa'i/_/gsung chen phag mo phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/
analyzed: rgyu 'thun 'bras bu smin mdzad pa'i/_/gsung chen phag mo phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/
translated: I praise the great speech of Varahi, who ripens the fruitional result that accords with the cause.

original: i i zhes pas gdug pa 'dul/_/nyon mongs dug gsum pho ba mdzad/_/zab
analyzed: i i zhes pas gdug pa 'dul/_/nyon mongs dug gsum pho ba mdzad/_/zab
translated: With i i, you tame the unruly and destroy the afflictions' three poisons.

original: pa gsung gi sgra sgrog ma/_/gdug pa 'dul la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/u u zhes
analyzed: pa gsung gi sgra sgrog ma/_/gdug pa 'dul la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/u u zhes
translated: I praise the one who proclaims the sound of profound speech and tames the unruly.

original: pas ngo mtshhar che/_/nyid kyi zhal nas rmad 'byung ma/_/chos kyi phyag rgya ston
analyzed: pas ngo mtshhar che/_/nyid kyi zhal nas rmad 'byung ma/_/chos kyi phyag rgya ston
translated: You who teach the Dharma seal,🔽I praise and offer homage to you, emanation of the Victorious Ones.

original: mdzad ma/_/rgyal ba'i sprul la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/e o zhes pas ci dang ci/
analyzed: mdzad ma/_/rgyal ba'i sprul la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/e o zhes pas ci dang ci/
translated: With “e o,” whatever it may be,🔽The command to transform great splendor,

original: gzi brjid chen po sgyur ba'i bka'/_/gsal ba rab tu gsal mdzad pa'i/_/
analyzed: gzi brjid chen po sgyur ba'i bka'/_/gsal ba rab tu gsal mdzad pa'i/_/
translated: You who illuminate and make things very clear,🔽I praise and offer homage to you, Vārāhī.

original: phag mo khyod la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/o spyo ces pa'i gsung chen gyis/_/bde
analyzed: phag mo khyod la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/o spyo ces pa'i gsung chen gyis/_/bde
translated: With the great speech of “o spyod,”🔽You proclaim the sound of great bliss,

original: ba chen po'i sgra sgrogs pa/_/'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'gro ba 'don/_/gsang
analyzed: ba chen po'i sgra sgrogs pa/_/'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'gro ba 'don/_/gsang
translated: You who liberate beings from the swamp of saṃsāra,🔽I praise and offer homage to you, secret mother.

original: ba'i yum la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/e a ces pa'i grags pa dang /_/nga rgyal
analyzed: ba'i yum la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/e a ces pa'i grags pa dang /_/nga rgyal
translated: With the fame of “e a” and the speech🔽Of great pride, you are the powerful lady of the vajra family,

original: chen po'i gsung bdag mo/_/rdo rje rigs kyi dbang mo ste/_/phag mo khyod la🔽bcom ldan 'das bde mchog 'khor lo'i bstod pa/
analyzed: chen po'i gsung bdag mo/_/rdo rje rigs kyi dbang mo ste/_/phag mo khyod la bcom ldan 'das bde mchog 'khor lo'i bstod pa/
translated: I praise and offer homage to you, Vārāhī.🔽Praise of the Bhagavān Cakrasaṃvara🔽The essence of the five sugata kāyas,

original: phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/bde gshegs sku lnga'i ngo bo nyid/_/gdul bya'i don
analyzed: phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/bde gshegs sku lnga'i ngo bo nyid/_/gdul bya'i don
translated: For the benefit of those to be tamed,

original: mdzad lha mo'i tshhul/_/ye shes 'khor lo'i stan la bzhugs/_/mkha' 'gro'i
analyzed: mdzad lha mo'i tshhul/_/ye shes 'khor lo'i stan la bzhugs/_/mkha' 'gro'i
translated: Seated on the seat of the wheel of timeless awareness,🔽I pay homage and offer praise at the feet of the dakinis.🔽Akṣobhya, the great vajra of the buddha family,

original: zhabs la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/mi bskyod rigs te rdo rje che/_/me long ye shes
analyzed: zhabs la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/mi bskyod rigs te rdo rje che/_/me long ye shes
translated: the very essence of mirrorlike timeless awareness,

original: ngo bo nyid/_/chos nyid mi 'gyur sku mdog mthing /_/phyag 'tshhal thugs kyi
analyzed: ngo bo nyid/_/chos nyid mi 'gyur sku mdog mthing /_/phyag 'tshhal thugs kyi
translated: the unchanging nature of reality, with a blue-colored body,🔽I pay homage to the wheel of enlightened mind.

original: 'khor lo la'o/_/'od dpag med de gsung gi rigs/_/mnyam nyid ye shes ngo
analyzed: 'khor lo la'o/_/'od dpag med de gsung gi rigs/_/mnyam nyid ye shes ngo
translated: Amitābha, the speech family, the very essence of the timeless awareness of equalness,🔽compassion that is free of attachment, with a red-colored body,

original: bo nyid/_/ma chags thugs rje dmar po'i mdog_/gsung gi 'khor lo phyag
analyzed: bo nyid/_/ma chags thugs rje dmar po'i mdog_/gsung gi 'khor lo phyag
translated: I pay homage to the wheel of enlightened speech.🔽Vairocana, the very essence of the enlightened body of the buddha family,

analyzed: 'tshhal bstod/_/rnam snang ngo bo sku'i rigs/_/chos dbyings ye shes ngo bo nyid/_/

analyzed: dag pa'i ye shes sku mdog dkar/_/phyag 'tshhal sku'i 'khor lo la'o/_/las kyi

original: rigs te 'phrin las bdag_/nan tan ye shes ngo bo nyid/_/sku mdog rigs
analyzed: rigs te 'phrin las bdag_/nan tan ye shes ngo bo nyid/_/sku mdog rigs
translated: with a body color of the karma family,

analyzed: 'dzin yi dwags gdan/_/dam tshhig 'khor lo phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/gang zhig

analyzed: he ru ka'i bstod pa 'di sgom phyag 'tshhal ba/_/lha dang mi rnams gsang ba gsum

analyzed: gyi bdag_/he ru ka'i gzugs 'dzin 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das bde

analyzed: mchog 'khor lo'i bstod pa/_dan da ka zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//
